data.name: Tales From The Dragon Mountain 2: The Lair
data.detailed_description:
Spirits are restless... Dark shadows are rising once again... For he has awaken!

It has been years since Mina defeated the evil Lord Strix. Then, there was a peace for all creatures of Dragon Mountains. But something's strange again. She can feel it in her veins.



It is once again up to Mina and her best friend spirit Malik to travel to distant parts of the world and find clues how to open the passage to a hidden wasteland - Lord Strix's lair in order to stop him once and for all.

In this hidden object puzzle adventure, you will travel between regions of Dragon Mountains through a network of forgotten ancient portals, meet different characters along your journey and help them and have them help you. Search and discover new places, find useful items and objects and solve many puzzles and mini-games. But hurry! Lord Strix gets stronger by the minute!



  • FIND and STOP the evil Lord Strix
  • INVESTIGATE dozens of fantasy locations
  • SEARCH for clues and FIND HIDDEN OBJECTS
  • SOLVE hundreds of quests and puzzles
  • HELP people and creatures of Dragon Mountains
  • EARN achievements
  • 3 DIFFICULTY MODES: customize how much help the game will provide you in your journey
  • BEAUTIFUL high-definition graphics
  • DISCOVER a TALE of friendship and courage

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows: Xp, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
